desc: Discover unique gifts, quirky jewelry, or a new trendy home decor piece at Quirks. Offering a wide array of unique American-made handcrafts, jewelry, home decor, folk art by Johanna Parker, Bethany Lowe and Lori Mitchell. Also the home of Lipstick and Chrome Brooches & Accessories. Free Shipping over $75.
